heading: Rosary.
alt-heading: Mary,. Blessed Virgin, Saint. Devotion to.
general-note: Here are entered works on the Catholic devotion to the Virgin Mary that consists of a system of prayers and meditations (called "mysteries") to be recited while holding a chain of beads that is used as a counter.  Prayer books in which the mysteries of the rosary appear in conjunction with psalms or other scriptural passages, meditations, or illustrations are entered under. Rosaries (Prayer books)..
